verses.verse: Then <S%G1899><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> I went up <S%G305><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>, and took <S%G4838><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> with me <S%G4838><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I went up <S%G305><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> communicated <S%G394><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> that gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I preach <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> privately <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> to them which were of reputation <S%G1380><s%>, lest by any means <S%G3381><s%> <S%G4458><s%> I should run <S%G5143><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> had run <S%G5143><s%>, in <S%G1519><s%> vain <S%G2756><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> a Greek <S%G1672><s%>, was compelled <S%G315><s%> to be circumcised <S%G4059><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> that because of <S%G1223><s%> false brethren <S%G5569><s%> unawares brought in <S%G3920><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> came in privily <S%G3922><s%> to spy out <S%G2684><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they might bring <S%G2615><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> into bondage <S%G2615><s%>:

To whom <S%G3739><s%> we gave place <S%G1502><s%> by subjection <S%G5292><s%>, no, not <S%G3761><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> an hour <S%G5610><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> might continue <S%G1265><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G575><s%> these who seemed <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> somewhat <S%G5100><s%>, (whatsoever <S%G3697><s%> <S%G4218><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%>, it maketh <S%G1308><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> matter <S%G1308><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>: God <S%G2316><s%> accepteth <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> person <S%G4383><s%>:) for <S%G1063><s%> they who seemed <S%G1380><s%> to be somewhat in conference added <S%G4323><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> contrariwise <S%G5121><s%>, when they saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> was committed unto me <S%G4100><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> the gospel of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> was unto Peter <S%G4074><s%>;

(For <S%G1063><s%> he that wrought effectually <S%G1754><s%> in Peter <S%G4074><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the apostleship <S%G651><s%> of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>, the same <S%G2532><s%> was mighty <S%G1754><s%> in me <S%G1698><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>:)

And <S%G2532><s%> when James <S%G2385><s%> <S%G2532><s%>, Cephas <S%G2786><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> seemed <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> pillars <S%G4769><s%>, perceived <S%G1097><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that was given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, they gave <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> the right hands <S%G1188><s%> of fellowship <S%G2842><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> should go unto <S%G1519><s%> the heathen <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>.

Only <S%G3440><s%> they would that <S%G2443><s%> we should remember <S%G3421><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%>; the same <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G4704><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was forward <S%G4704><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, I withstood <S%G436><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2596><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> to be blamed <S%G2607><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> that certain <S%G5100><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> James <S%G2385><s%>, he did eat <S%G4906><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they were come <S%G2064><s%>, he withdrew <S%G5288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, fearing <S%G5399><s%> them which were of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G3062><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> dissembled <S%G4942><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> with him <S%G846><s%>; insomuch <S%G5620><s%> that Barnabas <S%G921><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was carried away <S%G4879><s%> with their <S%G846><s%> dissimulation <S%G5272><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they walked <S%G3716><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> uprightly <S%G3716><s%> according to <S%G4314><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, I said <S%G2036><s%> unto Peter <S%G4074><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, livest <S%G2198><s%> after the manner of Gentiles <S%G1483><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as do the Jews <S%G2452><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> compellest thou <S%G315><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to live as do the Jews <S%G2450><s%>?
We <S%G2249><s%> who are Jews <S%G2453><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>,

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G1344><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G3362><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have believed <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we might be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>: for <S%G1360><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> shall <S%G1344><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be justified <S%G1344><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%>, while we seek <S%G2212><s%> to be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, we <S%G2147><s%> ourselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are found <S%G2147><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, is therefore <S%G687><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the minister <S%G1249><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>? God forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I build <S%G3618><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I destroyed <S%G2647><s%>, I make <S%G4921><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> a transgressor <S%G3848><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> am dead <S%G599><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might live <S%G2198><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.

I am crucified <S%G4957><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%>: nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> I live <S%G2198><s%>; yet not <S%G3765><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> the life which <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2198><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> I live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

I do <S%G114><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> frustrate <S%G114><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> come by <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, then <S%G686><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is dead <S%G599><s%> in vain <S%G1432><s%>.
